contest-event.event-date:
Sept. 6, 1858 D Belle Vue Brass Band Contest
British Open 1 Test Piece Contest
british-open
Set Test and Own Choice
"On Thee Each Living Soul Awaits" from 'The Creation'
Belle Vue, Manchester, Greater Manchester, England, UK Two movements from 'The Creation' - 'On Thee each living soul awaits' and 'Achieved is the glorious work' - plus an own-choice test piece.
Prizes: 1st: £25 2nd: £10 3rd: £6 4th: £4 5th: £3
April 12, 2011, 9:10 p.m. Feb. 19, 2020, 10:05 a.m.
1 East Lancashire Concert Band Radcliffe Barnes
2 Dewsbury Band Squire Greenwood
3 Mossley Band William Taylor
4 Holmfirth W. Mosley
5 Meltham and Meltham Mills Band H. Hartley
